body.p: If you wish to view another document while translating, select Open... from the File menu.

For a document already imported in , you can specify whether you want to browse the translation or the original. Then select the folder that contains the document from the Folders list. In the Documents list select the requested document and click Open.

For an external text file, first select the drive where this file is stored and the respective directory from the Directories list. In the Files list select the requested file and click Open to view it.
To leave this window, click Cancel.
